original_title: Mom & Dad Are Fucking My Friends 7
overview: Doghouse presents "Mom & Dad Are Fucking My Friends 7", starring Sandy, Betty Stylle, Colette, Ann Marie La Sante, Geena Gain, Joanne Sweet, Inna and Alison Star. Crazy couples bring tight little teens into the mix once again in volume 7 of Mom And Dad Are Fucking My Friends. These curious girls are gonna munch on some mom muff while getting banged by dad's wang. Each scene is sluttier and more depraved than the next, as pervy older couples get to scandalize some hot and horny starlets in the craziest threesome action.
title: Mom & Dad Are Fucking My Friends 7
